headline: Revvity wins FDA clearance for ChLIA assay in free testosterone measurement
summary: The authorisation marks the first for a ChLIA in direct and quantitative free testosterone testing.

raw.headline: Revvity wins FDA clearance for ChLIA assay in free testosterone measurement
raw.summary: The authorisation marks the first for a ChLIA in direct and quantitative free testosterone testing.

headline: Revvity Announces FDA Clearance for First Automated Free Testosterone Test
summary: WALTHAM, Mass., January 10, 2025--Revvity, Inc. (NYSE: RVTY), today announced that it received 510(k) clearance from the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) for EUROIMMUN’s automated chemiluminescence-based immunoassay (ChLIA) test for free testosterone. This innovative test is the first of its kind to receive FDA clearance for direct quantitative measurement of free testosterone levels, marking a significant advancement in diagnostic capabilities for androgen disorders.
